评论概述: Great fabric and cute but No space for boobs and weird sleeve seam
评论详情: Loved the colors and fabric. I got 3 colors and they look as advertised. The fabric is soft and stretchy. It is a slimmer fit, which I didn’t mind, but if you are a slimmer body type and have boobs above a B cup, it will look weird if you go with your normal shirt size. The seams from the torso of the shirt to the sleeves are too far in and stretch weird, so with having bigger boobs, it makes that seam travel farther in than normal. That is the one thing that is deceptive about the pictures. If you have bigger boobs, go up one or two sizes from your normal size to accommodate for this oversight in the design. I will be rebuying these in a bigger size!

what I like about Trendy Queen Long Sleeve Shirts is that I love the trendy Y2K style, with the V-neck and cropped fit making it perfect for layering during the fall. The slim fit gives it a flattering, modern look. I appreciate the soft and stretchy fabric, which is comfortable for all-day wear and suitable for cooler fall weather. This top works well for layering under jackets, sweaters, or over tanks, making it versatile for different fall outfits. The slim, fitted style accentuates the body shape, which is liked by me who looking for a more tailored look in my casual outfits. Lastly The shirt comes in a wide range of colors, which is a plus for me who want to match it with different outfits or seasonal palettes.
